text: The Musée gruérien is a museum dedicated to the ethnography and history of the Gruyère District of the Canton of Fribourg, Switzerland. It is located in Bulle. Its collection of over 25,000 objects includes prints, drawings, paintings, sculpture, textiles, tools, woodwork, ceramics, furniture, photographs, and so on."Dans les réserves du musée", Museum web site The museum opened in 1917. ==References== ==External links== * Official site (English) Category:Museums in the canton of Fribourg Category:History museums in Switzerland
title: Musée gruérien
